survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Demand Professional Development Platforms Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with on-demand professional development platforms provided by the company, focusing on usability, content relevance, and overall impact on skill development.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the company-provided on-demand professional development platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for better clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the company-provided on-demand professional development platform?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most valuable in the platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most valuable in the platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the relevance of the courses offered to your current role?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the relevance of the courses offered to your current role?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-demand professional development platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-demand professional development platform?

questions.question_text: Has using the platform contributed to your professional growth?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess perceived impact on professional growth.

script.question_text: Has using the platform contributed to your professional growth?
